data.actual_result: Your last message is shown inside the comment box (if you usually hit ctrl+v and then enter it'll essentially duplicate your last message)
data.expected_result: Upload image prompt comes up with an empty comment box
data.short_description: Last message duplicated when uploading images right after
data.steps_to_repro: - Have an image or screenshot on your clipboard (must be an image, not a url) - Send a text message - After the message is sent, quickly press Ctrl+V to paste the image
